text: we should be working to ensure that we

so we wouldn't need to but it hasn't and

they'd have won an election they'd have

s are paid in Euros but when you do the

can cash from the age of 63 and that

in the next few weeks and months
they won't qualify for a pension if we

ground

historically turnout in European
